test_cases.question: When does coverage start after purchase?
test_cases.answer: Coverage starts 30 days after the policy is issued.
contexts: Coverage effective date: benefits begin 30 days after the policy issue date.
Waiting periods may apply for specific riders.

test_cases.question: Is the deductible waived for preventive care visits?
test_cases.answer: Yes, preventive care visits have no deductible.
contexts: Preventive care visits are covered at 100% with no deductible.
Other outpatient services are subject to a standard deductible.
